item.title: Terraform - vSphere Windows Server Deployment
item.description: Overview The goal of this project is to deploy a ready-to-go windows server environment. This includes a domain controller, a replica domain controller, a DHCP server, and a fileserver. Additionally setting up users, groups, and OUs for the respective users within the domain. To complete this project, 3 steps are taken. Use Packer to spin up a sys prepped and fully updated windows server 2022 iso for the environemnt Use Terraform to deploy 4 virtual machines into a vSphere environment Use Ansible to configure these 4 virtual machines as desired Check out all of the configuration files on GitHub (vSphere-WinServ-Deployment) at the repository!
